definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: Walk into every corner of China through the logistics of I91u. cn.
sentences.chinese: 通过中国代购网网络物流可以销往中国任何一个角落。

sentences.english: But this the network buys on sb's behalf experience already made him dog-tired .
sentences.chinese: 但这次网络代购经历已让他筋疲力尽。

sentences.english: In the case of an entrusted purchase, the relevant entrustment document as held by the purchaser shall be subject to examination.
sentences.chinese: 对委托代购的，还应当查验购买人持有的委托文书。

sentences.english: The prices of goods that are purchased overseas on Taobao.com and other websites have risen.
sentences.chinese: 淘宝等网站上的海外代购商品已经开始涨价。

sentences.english: Therefore, they buy foreign products via purchasing agents.
sentences.chinese: 因此，他们愿意通过代购购买国外的商品。

sentences.english: The industry with its home-spun roots does have its challenges.
sentences.chinese: 代购这一以家庭为根源的产业确实也面临挑战。

sentences.english: Nothing separates the generations more than music.
sentences.chinese: 没有任何东西比音乐更能显示代购。

definition: online purchase of goods dispatched from overseas
sales counter dedicated to a certain kind of product (e.g. alcohol)
derivative (math.)/business on WeChat 微信[Wei1 xin4] leveraging one's social network/person who operates such a business
to generate fake transactions in order to game a commercial online platform (one that rewards users who make numerous transactions)
brick and mortar business/physical (rather than online) retail store
Taobao Marketplace, a Chinese website for online shopping
